short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a proper car image instead of boring thumbnails: replace the New Tab page with random Porsche photo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install my Porsche New Tab Theme and get HD wallpaper of Porsche cars every time you open a new tab.

FEATURES:
- Tens of high-quality HD wallpapers.
- Quick navigation menu with Most Visited, Bookmarks, History, Chrome Apps (optional)
- Customize the navigation bar to show/hide features (for purists who want the cleanest possible page)

The package includes, for sure, 911, 918, 919... and does not include any SUV pictures. It's made by fan, for real fans, therefore Porsche Carrera, turbo, GT... these are OK, but SUVs? Well, not in this version.

Visit our home page for more HD wallpapers and "New Tab" replacements themes: https://openaddons.com/
